title: Game for the first 10,000 DAWN tournament
body:
DAWN token holders can participate in the governance in DAWN ecosystem. In this first ecosystem proposal, we are asking the community preference for the first-ever DAWN tournament.

The first DAWN tournament will be hosted on the FirstBlood Esports platform. The total prize pool will be 10,000 DAWN. The tournament is free to participate, though DAWN token holders may receive VIP benefits over freerolling players. 

In this poll, the DAWN token holders may decide the game for this tournament.
author: 0xa5b8B83EFEd000C9F36D3ae3F19E1ab0542Cf3Af
